entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High zero.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High zero. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 3.

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High plus 2.
